title: Imlil Valley Treks
body: If you like hiking, then this side trip from Marrakech is the right thing for you. We listed here some examples of short rambles through the villages that surround Imlil.

title: Valleys and Berber Villages
body: These treks provides an excellent introduction to the high atlas mountains for the first time visitor

title: Basic Mount Toubkal Climb
body: Two day basic climb from Imlil to the summit and back via the same route.

title: Toubkal trek via Azzaden valley
body: This 3 day trek will take you out of the busy Imlil Valley into the peace of the Azzaden Valley befor climbing Toubkal.

title: Imlil to Setti Fadma
body: The trails leads through some outstandingly beutiful terrain and the views are the most far-reaching to be had in the High Atlas.

title: Ait Bougmez Traverse
body: Ait Bougmez Valley is among the most mystifying places in the mountain ranges of Atlas, leave the other places of Morocco for long vacations.

title: M’Goun Gorges and M’Goun summit
body: The picturesque villages and green valleys of the lower reaches of this trek contract wonderfully with the remoteness of its dramatic passes and the approach to the summit of M'goun...

title: Toubkal Winter Climb
body: Im winter, Mount Toubkal and its surrounding peaks provides some of the most spectacular winter trekking on earth.

title: Toubkal Circuit Trek
body: The views. not only from the summit of Toubkal, but also from the three major approach passes are quite atunning.

title: Ait Bougmez and Sermt Valley Trek
body: On this hike, you’ll find a patchwork of green pastures, fertile lands, and windy valleys surrounded by peaks that higher than usual (including Mgoun, the second-highest mountain in Morocco)
